name: Time-lapse Takeout
description:
Enjoy Your Meal 🥡

Come visit the Steamed Dumplings House for brunch! Maybe you'll gather some sweet pics for your social media account. Or perhaps there's more to this aesthetic food than meets the eye! 👀
(Chef's recommendation: Download below for PC for the best experience!)

Keyboard Controls
  • Mouse to move camera
  • Left click to: take pictures, choose menu options
  • Spacebar to advance dialogue
  • Tab to hit up your socials
  • Escape to quit the game
Credits

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: @ChonkersHQ
Game developed as part of the Cultural Heritage Game Jam.
Originally published on November 21, 2021
